description: Sophie Le Sueur is confirmed as the chief officer of Employment, Social Security and Housing.
title: New chief confirmed for Jersey government department
title_page: New chief confirmed for Jersey government department - BBC News
maintext:
A new chief officer of Employment, Social Security and Housing has been confirmed.
The Government of Jersey has awarded the role to Sophie Le Sueur who had been acting as interim chief officer since September.
Deputy Lyndsay Feltham said she was "the ideal person" to lead the department since she had held eight different roles in the government since joining in 2005.
Ms Le Sueur said she was "honoured to be appointed" and "passionate" about delivering services to residents.
